description:
Why roadsurfer?

TEAMSPIRIT & TEAMEVENTS: Look forward to a collegial atmosphere with flat hierarchies, lots of fun and great team spirit as well as regular team events such as joint barbecues or simply an after-work drink at your station.
CAMPER BUDGET: You get a free rental for our campers so you can experience the #happyroadsurfing lifestyle for yourself.
DISCOUNTS: Take advantage of our corporate benefits platform and Family & Friends discounts.

The role - your passion
Your responsibilities include but are not limited to the following:
You lend a hand and take over the exterior and interior cleaning of our campers.
You explain and hand over our campers to the customers.
You put a smile on our customers' faces when they pick up and return their camper and make their roadsurfer journey unforgettable.
You manage the payment processes and check in rental payments and collect security deposits.
You support our station team with all daily tasks and make sure that our #happyroadsurfers leave the yard happy.

What You Need To Surf The Wave With Us
You are absolutely hands-on and lend a hand at all times.
Experience in dealing with customers.
Class B driving license.
Must be authorized to work in the United States and not require work authorization sponsorship by our company for this position now or in the future.

WORK CONDITIONS
Station Hours: Monday through Sunday 9am – 6pm, availability on weekends mandatory.
Job Type: Hourly, Full Time-Pay Range: $20.00 to $25.00 (internal Title - Station Service Specialist).
Working mostly outdoors.
Zip Code: 13600 S Inglewood Ave, Hawthorne CA 90250, USA.

roadsurfer is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, mental or physical disability, genetic information, marital status, military status, protected veteran status or any other category protected by law.

Ready to surf?
Are you made for the job? Then we look forward to receiving your application! If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at team@roadsurfer.com and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
